items.sentence: Tom said he needed to get up early tomorrow morning.
Tom said he saw Mary sitting in the park by herself.
Tom wasn\'t happy with the way he was being treated.
I wish I could change places with Tom, but I can\'t.
I wish I hadn\'t eaten the sandwich Tom made for me.
What\'s the most disgusting food you\'ve ever eaten?
Don\'t ask me to choose between you and my children.
Don\'t do anything to attract attention to yourself.
Don\'t forget to take your umbrella when you go out.
I still think we should\'ve gone to Boston with Tom.
